On snow, this latest sensation is called Speed Riding - a blend of paragliding and skiing that lets you ride/fly the slopes at incredible speeds. Adding the flight manouverability of a glider to the turn of your skis adds a whole new dimension to coming down the mountain. It's an exhilarating sport that will excite and fascinate both participants and spectators.

As with any extreme sport, take your time and don't rush things. At a minimum, you should have both excellent paragliding as well as skiing experience. That experience should involve awareness of mountain, climate, and equipment conditions.

There is no Guarantee every launch will allow you to complete your flight and you may not be able to relaunch to continue your flight, Off-piste skiing and mountaineering skills are required to get you off the mountain safely. Speed-Flying is banned on all marked or prepared piste's.
